listOfObjects.name: Intel Pentium Gold G7400 Alder Lake Processor
listOfObjects.description: Intel 12th Gen Pentium Gold G7400 Alder Lake Processor is a CPU from Intel. Intel Pentium Gold G7400 12th gen Processor turns your desktop computer system or data server into a more efficient machine. This 12th generation 3.7 GHz processor features two Performance cores and 6MB of cache with support for up to four threads, providing the power to run and multitask a variety of applications. The Pentium Gold G7400 also includes support for PCI Express 5.0 and dual-channel DDR5 memory in addition to having integrated Intel UHD 710 Graphics. An Intel Laminar RS1 thermal solution is included.

listOfObjects.name: PCIe 4.0 & 5.0
listOfObjects.description: Intel 12th Gen Pentium Gold G7400 Alder Lake Processor supports up to four PCIe 4.0 and sixteen PCIe 5.0 lanes, delivering 20 lanes in total for exceptional data throughput with compatible devices.

listOfObjects.name: Integrated Intel UHD Graphics
listOfObjects.description: Intel Pentium Gold G7400 12th gen Alder Lake Processor has The integrated Intel UHD 710 Graphics. The integrated Intel UHD 710 Graphics delivers rich 3D performance with high-quality visuals.

listOfObjects.name: Intel Deep Learning Boost
listOfObjects.description: Intel Pentium Gold G7400 12th gen Alder Lake Processor has Intel Deep Learning Boost Accelerates AI inference to improve performance for deep learning workloads.

listOfObjects.name: Gaussian & Neural Accelerator 3.0
listOfObjects.description: Intel 12th Gen Pentium Gold G7400 Alder Lake Processor comes with The Gaussian and Neural Accelerator 3.0 (GNA) technology to help with noise suppression while enhancing background blurring during video chats.Intel 12th Gen Pentium Gold G7400 Alder Lake Processor offers a 3-year warranty (No Warranty for Fan or Cooler).

listOfObjects.name: What is the price of Intel Pentium Gold G7400 Alder Lake Processor in Bangladesh?
listOfObjects.description: The latest price of Intel Pentium Gold G7400 Alder Lake Processor in Bangladesh is 6,999৳. You can buy the Intel Pentium Gold G7400 Alder Lake Processor at best price from our website or visit any of our showrooms.
